review: Absolutely amazing game, plenty of cars to use, plenty of places to see and plenty of things to do in this game. When I received word about the Wild Run Expansion coming out, I was and still am ecstatic about what it as to offer, cannot wait. Also, really great to hear that they are listening to the community, lots of respect for this game.
